review: Love the Apple TV.  I bought several Rokus, but with the lower price I took another look at the Apple TV and wished I got it earlier sinceit works great for several reasons.1.All my itunes songs can be played (even without the iphone) and I have the apple tv going through my stereo as well.2.Pictures and videos that are stored on my WD Mycloud network storage can be played/displayed with my iphone by using the airplay and mirroring functions of Apple TV.  I found Airplay very reliable and unlimited since it can Airplay anything on my iphone compared to Rokus phone app which is flakely and limited in what it can play from my phone.3.Itunes radio nicely replaces Pandora, but I still can Airplay Pandora from my iphone to the Apple TV.4.I like that the ATV has the power supply in the device which makes it heavier to hold on to the weight of hefty HDMI cables and takes less room on the power strip.5.Video Streaming seems clearer to me when using Netflix.6.Startup of apps seems faster than Roku like Netflix and Youtube.7.All the main apps I need are on the ATV, but if I need to use one that is missing I can always Airplay from my iphone.
